catentdesc.name: Gusso White Casual Shirt
catentdesc.shortdescription: White casual shirt with bib and point collar
catentdesc.longdescription: Sweet and smart, this white cotton blend shirt with point collar and bib with pintuck stitching is designed to make you feel ready for anything. A must for any wardrobe, this shirt features a button-through closure and cropped turn up sleeves. The pleats given for the bib add style to this shirt, while the tailored fit makes it a pleasure to wear.

catentdesc.name: Gusso Brown Ruched Top with Bodice
catentdesc.longdescription: This soft cotton and spandex blend top has a contrast-colored fitted bodice for extra comfort. The ruching at the waist and around the shoulders display a gathered look, which shows off a slendar form.

catentdesc.name: Luigi Valenti Printed Corset
catentdesc.longdescription: This printed corset with sweetheart neckline and moulded cups is designed to look cute while being naughty. The fitted bodice and the seam detailing add style while the solid color hem defines the top.

catentdesc.name: Luigi Valenti Blue Cotton Shirt
catentdesc.shortdescription: Blue cotton shirt with point collar
catentdesc.longdescription: Blue cotton shirt with point collar that fits in well in the office. Tailored to fit your body, this full sleeved shirt with wide cuffs and button-through front closure adds color to your day.

catentdesc.name: Borsati Pink Collarless Top
catentdesc.shortdescription: Pink collarless top with cap sleeves
catentdesc.longdescription: Cool as they come, this pleasing pink top with cap sleeves and defined hemline is fashionable and smart. The boat neck adds style and panache to this fitted top. Comfort is provided by the polyester and spandex material.

catentdesc.name: Gusso Polyester Printed Top
catentdesc.shortdescription: Polyester printed top with contrast cuffs and collar
catentdesc.longdescription: V-necked printed top that brings out your stylish self. The contrast cuffs and rounded point collar adds chic definition while the print is smart and elegant. Pair this figure-hugging top with old style jeans for an informal look.

catentdesc.name: Albini Beige Peasant Top
catentdesc.shortdescription: Beige peasant top with feathery sleeves
catentdesc.longdescription: Dressy and smart, this beige top provides chic appeal with the rich material. The feathery cap sleeves with the detailing add to the tailored look while the crew neck adds simplicity to the monochromatic theme.

catentdesc.name: Versatil Plaid Woven Top
catentdesc.shortdescription: Plaid shirt with waist tie and mandarin collar
catentdesc.longdescription: This loose-fitting shirt with large contrast checks and mandarin collar is comfortable beyond belief. The pleat detailing at the front and the gathering due to the waist tie add style to this casual wear. The loose and cropped sleeves and the curved hemline add to the feeling of comfort. The button-through front closure gives an open neck design.

catentdesc.name: Albini Black Georgette Top
catentdesc.longdescription: This polyester and spandex top with ribbed hemline adds to the charm in any occasion. Strappy and loose-fitting, this black printed georgette top is smart and sweet.

catentdesc.name: Hermitage Pinstriped Slim Fit Shirt
catentdesc.longdescription: Elegant and smart, this striped shirt has a point collar and long sleeves with matching wide satin cuffs. The patch button-through front fastening with lining defines the contemporary style. The feminine touch is provided by the tuck in the front along with the curved hemline.

catentdesc.name: Luigi Valenti Striped Umbrella Top
catentdesc.shortdescription: Striped umbrella top with horizontal stripes
catentdesc.longdescription: This black and cream top in horizontal stripes and a straight boat neck is smart and trendy. The short umbrella sleeves give a casual yet stylish impression. Pair this lengthy top with a mini skirt to complete the look.

catentdesc.name: Hermitage Black Pinstriped Top
catentdesc.shortdescription: Black pinstriped top with long sleeves
catentdesc.longdescription: This tailored pure cotton shirt with black and white pinstripe design makes you feel eager to get to work. The button fastening through the front and the curved hemline give a feminine touch to the otherwise strict look. The long sleeves and the wide-buttoned cuffs also add to the attractive design.

catentdesc.name: Versatil Drape Top
catentdesc.shortdescription: Black drape top with semi-exposed sleeves
catentdesc.longdescription: Draped V-neck top with semi-exposed long sleeves to give you an edge. Designed with a gathered neckline and longerline cut, you can carry off this black top for an evening out or at a party. The solid design and the bodycon fit will suit most body types and give you confidence.

catentdesc.name: Luigi Valenti Floral Georgette Top
catentdesc.shortdescription: Floral georgette top with surplice neckline
catentdesc.longdescription: This printed georgette shirt with V-neck brings out the feminine charm. The flowery print is elegant while the surplice neckline and the straight hemline add to the style. The sash cinches the waist into a slim fit.

catentdesc.name: Albini Red Puff Sleeve Shirt
catentdesc.shortdescription: Red shirt with pinstripe work in the front along with short puff sleeves
catentdesc.longdescription: Adding color to your wardrobe is this red shirt with point collar and button-through front fastening. The pinstriped work in the front and the short puff sleeves with the gathered detailing and satin cuffs add charm.

catentdesc.name: Gusso Striped Cowl Neck Top
catentdesc.shortdescription: Striped cowl neck top with vertical stripes
catentdesc.longdescription: This striped georgette top has a relaxed fit and is casual and comfortable for any occasion. Skimming gracefully over the body, the cowl neckline and the waist tie is stylish and fashionable. The vertical stripes lend an appearance of increased height.
